lead_paragraph: Russia's Yuliya Zaripova has been stripped of the gold medal she won in the women's 3,000 metres steeplechase at the 2012 London Olympics, the International Olympic Committee (IOC) said on Monday.

headline.print_headline: Russia's Zaripova Stripped of London Steeplechase Gold Medal
headline.main: Russia's Zaripova Stripped of London Steeplechase Gold Medal

snippet: Russia's Yuliya Zaripova has been stripped of the gold medal she won in the women's 3,000 metres steeplechase at the 2012 London Olympics, the International Olympic Committee (IOC) said on Monday....
